testsuite.name: runner.CucumberTest

testcase.name: Test the functionality of the "Place Order" button
Test the functionality of the "Close" button in the Place Order form
Test the functionality of the "Delete" button in the Place Order form
Test the functionality of the Place Order form normal
Test the functionality of the Place Order form without a name
Test the functionality of the Place Order form without a credit card information

testcase.name: Test the functionality of the "Place Order" button to place multiple orders
Test the functionality of the contact form normal
Test the functionality of the close button in the contact form
Test the functionality of the contact form with invalid contact email
Test the functionality of the contact form with invalid contact name
Test the functionality of the contact form without a message
Test the functionality of the carousel previous button
Test the functionality of the carousel next button
Test the functionality of "Phones" category
Test the functionality of "Laptops" category
